name: Tiny Cursed House
description:
Explore a tiny cursed house, fight ghosts and collect keystones to escape to safety!

  • A / D : Move left and right
  • J : Fireball
  • K : Jump
  • Enter : Pause

Requires Java
Estimated Length: 5-15 Minutes.

An incredibly short 2D platformer that I made back in 2016. I wanted to challenge myself to make something that was fully playable from beginning to end, regardless of how short it'd be.

(PLEASE NOTE: The game lacks any kind of background music, this is not a bug.)
